title: Ribbon courgettes with tzatziki

default: 1 courgette, sliced into thin ribbons using a vegetable peeler

steps: Place the courgette into a bowl with the balsamic vinegar and olive oil. Let it stand for four minutes.
For the tzatziki, place the Greek yogurt, mint and spring onion into a bowl and mix well.
To serve, place the courgette ribbons in a pile onto a plate, with the tzatziki spooned over the top.
